title: Nioxin System 2 Cleanser & Scalp Therapy for Fine Thinning Hair Duo 33.8 oz
description: Nioxin System 2 Cleanser - for fine, non-chemically enhanced hair that noticeably thinning - gently cleanses and removes toxins like DHT. BioAMP adds thickness and strengthens the hair shaft. Bionutrients and Activ-Renewal help provide a more youthful-looking scalp complexion. Unique Scalp-Access delivery system helps protect nutrients as they nourish the scalp and hair.

title: Avani Dead Sea Skin Renewal Facial Peel
description:
Skin Renewal Facial Peel Enriched with beneficial vitamins E & C, this Skin Renewal Facial Peel thoroughly cleanses the skin, ridding it of dead skin cells, excess oil and other impurities. Infused with nourishing Dead Sea Minerals, this non-abrasive Facial Peel will leave your skin feeling radiant and revitalized.

Directions: Gently apply a small amount to dry face in a circular motion. Once all impurities and dead skin cells are visible, rinse well with water and gently dry.

title: Avani Dead Sea Timeless Advanced Micro-capsule Serum Net. 1 FL. OZ.
description:
This advanced and original serum has been formulated to have a long-lasting and immediate effect. The anti-oxidant effect of green tea blended with vitamins A, C and E, as well as enzymes and collagen helps prevent the aging process while renewing the complexion. The collagen gives the skin an added smooth and glowing appearance. The witch hazel has a tightening effect and the enzyme contained in the formula has a lightening effect. As a result of this formula's innovative properties, its results are refreshing and rejuvenating.

Directions: Using your fingertips, gently apply one or two drops around the eye area. To complete the treatment apply AVANI Mineral Eye Cream.

title: Avani Dead Sea Mineral Enriched Moisturizing Cream - For Normal to Dry Skin
description:
This rich moisturizing cream has been formulated from nourishing Dead Sea minerals combined with a wealth of natural ingredients that are vital for healthy skin such as Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil and vitamin E. This unique combination of natural ingredients quickly restores the skin's natural moisture levels to leave a smoother, more radiant complexion.

Directions: Apply to face with light, upward strokes until absorbed. Ideal as a make-up base.

title: Ultrax Labs Hair Solace Caffeine Hair Loss Hair Growth Stimulating Conditioner
description:
Ultrax Labs Hair Solace contains caffeinated compounds integrated with essential oils that produce unrivaled results when coupled with Ultrax Labs Hair Surge. Supported by worldwide research and customer feedback, this highly concentrated formula is finally 

available for all.Benefits    •Effective hair recovery formula    •  Easy to use    • 100% satisfaction guarantee    • Made in the USA    • Helps give you hair that you can be proud ofActive Ingredients    • Caffeine - Studies have shown that when applied transdermally, this powerful 

ingredient can help extend the life cycle of hair follicles and encourage healthy hair.    • Eucalyptus - Japanese studies have found this herb to strengthen the hairs root by improving elasticity in the new-growth part of the cortex.    • Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil - Powerful scalp cleanser that helps alleviate sebum buildup that may impede normal hair growth.    • Chamomile Recutitta - Chamomile has been used for generations to treat inflamed and irritated skin and high levels of inflammation has been show to hinder hair growth.

title: Dove Men+Care Sensitive + Face Wash, 5 Ounces
Phytoworx Hair Recovery and Regrowth Supplement | Against All types of Hair Loss
description: Phytoworx Hair Recovery Supplement has been formulated with top proven ingredients designed to stimulate hair growth from the inside out. Use with the Phytoworx Organic Shampoo for best results.
